Html:
hi all

im using PHPword to create reports online and send them as email attachments, for the example i use the "document with table" code from the examples folder, save the file on the server and send it by mail.

the file is working OK when downloading the file to local machine and open with MS-Word, but when i try to open the file with Goolge Docs/Drive i get unexplained error.

i also get an error when trying to upload the file to google docs/drive.

this only happens when i add table abject to the document i create.


thanks,
Itamar
